Why did you join the war efforts?
<g id="male_spreadhands" />The Corrupted took Yuki from me. <g id="male_explain" />My darling dog helped me be less serious, especially when he'd tilt his head sideways and poke his tongue out at me.
<g id="female_crossarmsSuspicious" />Now, I have nothing but the war. <g id="female_smackfist" />I will send the Corrupted back to whatever hell they've come from.
Kazu has a gentle heart and a strong will to rid the island of Corrupted.
Thank you for helping him this far. WE will protect him from here.
"Who are you?"
A well-wisher. We look after our feral brethren and those who would take care of them.
Kazu showed great caring towards one of us. We are merely repaying the favor.
The Spark is unwavering and indivisible. I, Excubitor Livia Luca, live in the light. If you have not witnessed the light, then you soon will.
Greetings, my fellow believer. The path here in Great Cleave is twisted. Keep focused on the Spark - it will always guide you through.
Greetings, my fellow believer. The path here in Great Cleave is twisted. Keep focused on the Spark - it will always guide you through. [ Level 39 required for Great Cleave faction missions ]
I have been looking forward to making your acquaintance, {playerName}.
You have come because you are prepared to face the trial to advance in rank?
I have been looking forward to making your acquaintance, {playerName}.
You have come because you are prepared to face the trial to advance in rank? [ Level 39 required for Great Cleave faction missions ]
We will keep these revelations about Adjudicator Maras between us for now. We must choose the right moment to confront her.
We will keep these revelations about Adjudicator Maras between us for now.
We must choose the right moment to confront her. [ Level 39 required for Great Cleave faction missions ]
Greetings and well met, fellow Lightbringer. You were involved in that business with Livia Luca, weren't you?
It's a shame. She was a woman of great faith once. We must always keep vigil.
Greetings and well met, fellow Lightbringer. You were involved in that business with Livia Luca, weren't you?
It's a shame. She was a woman of great faith once. We must always keep vigil. [ Level 39 required for Great Cleave faction missions ]

string.comment: Eastburn Outpost, Team player, but holds grudges against those who wrong him
string.speaker: Warden Sexton
string.name: WardenSexton

resources.string: Welcome, I’m James Sexton, a Soulwarden here at Eastburn Outpost.

string.comment: Eastburn Outpost, Team player, but holds grudges against those who wrong him
string.speaker: Warden Sexton
string.name: WardenSexton

resources.string: I'm impressed you made it through; even if there's no bad weather, there's sure to be Corrupted blocking the roads.

string.comment: Leads into 'Shadows Cast By A Final Salute' quest
string.speaker: Warden Sexton
string.name: WardenSexton

resources.string: Do you have any idea how worried I've been about…oh, you're not her. My apologies.

string.comment: Leads into 'Shadows Cast By A Final Salute' quest
string.speaker: Warden Sexton
string.name: WardenSexton

resources.string: I'm surprised to see a new face around, our outpost isn't exactly known for casual visits. Especially not in wartime.

string.comment: Leads into 'All That's Left Not Torn Asunder' quest
string.speaker: Warden Sexton
string.name: WardenSexton

resources.string: Thank you again for recovering Patricia's belongings. It didn't seem right for some Corrupted husk to carry her Heartgem. It means a lot, to have it back.

string.comment: Leads into 'All That's Left Not Torn Asunder' quest
string.speaker: Warden Sexton
string.name: WardenSexton

resources.string: Oh! You’ve reminded me of something.

string.comment: After 'All That's Left Not Torn Asunder' quest
string.speaker: Warden Sexton
string.name: WardenSexton

resources.string: When I think of Patricia, fallen to Corruption, I get so mad I can't see straight.

string.comment: After 'All That's Left Not Torn Asunder' quest
string.speaker: Warden Sexton
string.name: WardenSexton

resources.string: If only there was something I could do to reverse her condition.

string.comment: Eastburn Outpost, Direct, no-nonsense, longs for home
string.speaker: Warden Chang
string.name: WardenChang

resources.string: Hello {playerName}, I’m Zhen Chang, a Soulwarden assigned to Eastburn Outpost.

string.comment: Eastburn Outpost, Direct, no-nonsense, longs for home
string.speaker: Warden Chang
string.name: WardenChang

resources.string: How are you liking the cold? I wish I had stayed home insteading of heading into this snowy waste.

string.comment: Leads into 'Descent to Frosted Slumber' quest
string.speaker: Warden Chang
string.name: WardenChang

resources.string: So you've seen the monstrosity called Cleaves Malice?

string.comment: Leads into 'Descent to Frosted Slumber' quest
string.speaker: Warden Chang
string.name: WardenChang

resources.string: The Corrupted were able to build it so quickly because we'd done most of the work for them.

string.comment: Leads into 'Transmuting Iron to Dust' quest
string.speaker: Warden Chang
string.name: WardenChang

resources.string: If it's not one thing, it's another. No rest for the weary, friend. Not when there's work to be done.
Thank you for collecting all these Heartgems. I know it wasn’t easy.
But the souls of our friends won’t find rest until we cleanse the Corruption from them. For that, we’ll need to hold a cleansing ritual.
I'm honestly surprised to see you still around. Don't get me wrong, your aid has been invaluable.
But if I had the choice, I'd be headed home, or at least someplace warmer.

string.comment: Cleave's Point Outpost, Loyal, earnest, jumps to conclusions
string.speaker: Warden Magoro
string.name: WardenMagoro

resources.string: Welcome! I’m Soulwarden Ayize Magoro.

string.comment: Cleave's Point Outpost, Loyal, earnest, jumps to conclusions
string.speaker: Warden Magoro
string.name: WardenMagoro

resources.string: It does my heart good to see someone new around here. Please, tell me stories of the outside world.

string.comment: Leads into 'Blessings of the Fallen' quest
string.speaker: Warden Magoro
string.name: WardenMagoro

resources.string: Have you heard the stories, Warden? Beyond Glass Lake there's a blessed hilltop, where Corruption can't take root.

string.comment: Leads into 'Blessings of the Fallen' quest
string.speaker: Warden Magoro
string.name: WardenMagoro

resources.string: Imagine living in such a place, free from Corruption and this infernal war…

string.comment: Leads into 'The Best of Us' quest
string.speaker: Warden Magoro
string.name: WardenMagoro

resources.string: Oh, I'm glad to see your face. {playerName}, we need your help. Something terrible has happened. It's Warden Dimka.
May your spirit stay strong in these dark times. We can't afford to lose another Soulwarden to Corruption.

string.comment: Cleave's Point Outpost, Curious, multi-lingual and mixes languages when she speaks
string.speaker: Warden Owens
string.name: WardenOwens

resources.string: Bienvenue! I’m Judithe Owens. I'm a Soulwarden based here in Cleave's Point Outpost.

string.comment: Cleave's Point Outpost, Curious, multi-lingual and mixes languages when she speaks
string.speaker: Warden Owens
string.name: WardenOwens

resources.string: I'd love to talk to you about where you're from, sometime when you aren't too busy.
You're quite the traveller, aren't you? You've been to quite a few places here in Great Cleave.
Have you managed to make it over to the Eeriedune Graveyard or Misty Borough?

string.comment: Leads into 'Twisted Metamorphosis' quest. Marhaba = hello in Arabic
string.speaker: Warden Owens
string.name: WardenOwens

resources.string: Hello, marhaba, {playerName}. I've been getting some horrifying reports from Capitulum Prime.

string.comment: Leads into 'Twisted Metamorphosis' quest. Marhaba = hello in Arabic
string.speaker: Warden Owens
string.name: WardenOwens

resources.string: Something strange is going on there, even stranger than those lanterns I had you gather before.

string.comment: Leads into 'The Winding Mountain Path' quest
string.speaker: Warden Owens
string.name: WardenOwens

resources.string: {playerName}, I’ve learned a lot of languages in my time on this earth.

string.comment: Leads into 'The Winding Mountain Path' quest
string.speaker: Warden Owens
string.name: WardenOwens

resources.string: There aren’t enough words in any of them to thank you enough for what you’ve done for us here.
We've learned our lesson, like calls to like.
We won't be storing all the Heartgems of the Corrupted Soulwardens all in one place anymore.
Welcome to Eastburn Outpost, my friend. Soulwarden Dac-Kien Phan at your service.
Unfortunately the war against the Corrupted has prevented us from receiving news from other areas, so you are a welcome sight.
If only you could have seen this place before the war.
Still, it's great to see someone new around here, it means there's still hope!

string.comment: Leads into 'The Ties That Blind' quest
string.speaker: Warden Phan
string.name: WardenPhan

resources.string: Oh, there you are. Listen…I was hoping you could do me a personal favor.

string.comment: After 'All That's Left Not Torn Asunder' quest
string.speaker: Warden Phan
string.name: WardenPhan

resources.string: You'd best keep yourself safe out there, {playerName}!

string.comment: After 'All That's Left Not Torn Asunder' quest
string.speaker: Warden Phan
string.name: WardenPhan

resources.string: We can't afford to lose any more people around here, moral is low enough as it is.

string.comment: After 'To Warm the Soul Wardens' quest
string.speaker: Warden Phan
string.name: WardenPhan

resources.string: Warm food is the best way to raise morale. It's easy to forget the Corrupted for a few moments while savoring a hot meal.

string.comment: Cleave's Point Outpost, Determined, believes you have to earn your place by merit, melancholy
string.speaker: Warden Dimka
string.name: WardenDimka

resources.string: Be welcome, newcomer. I’m Sauquillo Dimka, a Soulwarden at Cleave's Point.

string.comment: Cleave's Point Outpost, Determined, believes you have to earn your place by merit, melancholy
string.speaker: Warden Dimka
string.name: WardenDimka

resources.string: If you work hard, you will go far, especially in dark times like these.

string.comment: Leads into 'For A Rainy Day' quest
string.speaker: Warden Dimka
string.name: WardenDimka

resources.string: I…I can’t let myself think about this right now. Not when there’s so much work to be done.
Hello. Sorry, but I'm not in a talking mood.

string.comment: Eastburn Outpost, Softspoken despite his large size, master of stealth, effectively uses silence
string.speaker: Ranger Knatchbull
string.name: RangerKnatchbull

resources.string: Hello, I’m Rymon Knatchbull. I've been a Ranger in Great Cleave longer than most people have been on living in the outposts.

string.comment: Leads into 'Facets of Light and Darkness' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Knatchbull
string.name: RangerKnatchbull

resources.string: I've seen you around the outpost, helping the Wardens.

string.comment: Leads into 'Facets of Light and Darkness' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Knatchbull
string.name: RangerKnatchbull

resources.string: If you're willing to give us a little more aid, you may be just what we need to turn the tide against the Corrupted.

string.comment: Leads into 'The Rampant Conviction of Hope' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Knatchbull
string.name: RangerKnatchbull

resources.string: I thought I'd be seeing you sooner rather than later. Have you spoken recently with Ranger Madaki?

string.comment: After 'The Rampant Conviction of Hope' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Knatchbull
string.name: RangerKnatchbull

resources.string: Hard to stay hidden when carrying a hammer like the Rampant Conviction of Hope.

string.comment: After 'The Rampant Conviction of Hope' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Knatchbull
string.name: RangerKnatchbull

resources.string: But I bet you could do it, if you put your mind to it.

string.comment: Cleave's Point Outpost, Optimist, tries to cheer others up
string.speaker: Ranger Law
string.name: RangerLaw

resources.string: Welcome to Cleave's Point! I’m Ranger Mirrell Law.

string.comment: Cleave's Point Outpost, Optimist, tries to cheer others up
string.speaker: Ranger Law
string.name: RangerLaw

resources.string: Just you wait, we'll be turning the tide against the Corrupted any day now!

string.comment: Leads into 'Rainbow Hearts, Shadowed Intent' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Law
string.name: RangerLaw

resources.string: Did you know four of our forts are currently held by the Corrupted? Four!

string.comment: Leads into 'Rainbow Hearts, Shadowed Intent' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Law
string.name: RangerLaw

resources.string: Acedia Bastion, Breakaway Fort, Hollowing Fort, and Nullcavity.
You did a fine job out at Eastburn, really helped them out with their problems.
I've heard something that might be helpful to you.
Just seeing Prime Resolve makes me feel warm inside!
Have you been using it to cleanse the land of the Corrupted? Soon, all of Aeternum will be clean.

string.comment: Snobbish, hipster-esque, sharp tongue, cutting remarks
string.speaker: Ranger Balogun
string.name: RangerBalogun

resources.string: Yes, it's really me. I’m Ranger Kayode Balogun, the best Ranger this side of Great Cleave.

string.comment: Snobbish, hipster-esque, sharp tongue, cutting remarks
string.speaker: Ranger Balogun
string.name: RangerBalogun

resources.string: Those other Rangers try, but they don't understand what it takes to be the best.
You're making quite a name for yourself, {playerName}.
You're the adventurer who braved Infernal Host, in Shattered Mountain!
Ah, I knew it was you!
I can hear the pure tones of Glimmering Mercy ring out as you approach. I have to admit, it suits you.

string.comment: Always talks about their pets, active, doesn't sit still
string.speaker: Ranger Fowler
string.name: RangerFowler

resources.string: Hi there! I’m Ranger Tibbe Fowler. Have you met my pet rabbit? I'm sure he was around here somewhere…

string.comment: Always talks about their pets, active, doesn't sit still
string.speaker: Ranger Fowler
string.name: RangerFowler

resources.string: No matter how many times I warn him about the dangers he keeps haring off!

string.comment: Leads into 'Forging the Azure Ravager' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Fowler
string.name: RangerFowler

resources.string: You found me, good! I'm often on the move.

string.comment: Leads into 'Forging the Azure Ravager' quest
string.speaker: Ranger Fowler
string.name: RangerFowler

resources.string: When Madaki told me about this Corrupted weapon plot, I didn't quite believe her... sounded a bit outlandish, honestly.
Ooo, look at that! You have the Azure Ravager! I'd love to toss it at the Corrupted and see what it can do.
Hello, I'm Master Fisher Eberhart Klaus. The fish around here present a challenge like no other. Just like the mountains themselves.
I see you've recently been fishing up treasure chests for Master Abebe. How is he these days?
You've done the Soulwardens a great service with those rations. Nothing like a little fresh fish to spice up their meals.

string.comment: Puts others first, spiritual, kind to a fault
string.speaker: Ranger Heatly
string.name: RangerHeatley

resources.string: Welcome to Great Cleave {playerName}. I’m Jennifer Heatly, a Ranger in these parts.
There is something to be said about the different faces of winter. The lashing winds of ice, the gentle death of snow.
I can really feel the effects of Rimelash.
I wouldn't want to get too close, there's a icy calm about you that speaks of storms on your horizon.
Orbs of Power
Gypsum Kilns are used to create powerful items. Find Gypsum then learn the ways of the kiln.
(Optional) Approach the Gypsum Kiln in Bastion
Craft a Gypsum Orb
(Optional) Travel to Bastion in Great Cleave
Craft a Gyspum Orb or travel to the Kiln in Bastion
